title: Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez Recounts Capitol Riot Attack | Ibram X. Kendi
itunes:title: Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez Recounts Capitol Riot Attack | Ibram X. Kendi
description:
Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez shares her Capitol riot experience, Trevor highlights Wall Street hypocrisy, and Ibram X. Kendi discusses "How to Be an Antiracist" and "Four Hundred Souls."


Please visit dailyshow.com/DreamingOutLoud to help provide healthy food, sustainable food systems and economic opportunity to marginalized communities.
